TopicTitle: Kerbalcon webpage links to old KerbalSP channel instead of KSPTV.

Articles.Content: http://kerbalcon.com/ links to http://www.twitch.tv/kerbalsp instead of http://www.twitch.tv/ksptv
at a guess... I'd say it's because it's still that way from the last one and haven't updated the site for the upcoming one yet.
It's not on KSPTV or KerbalSP twitch channels yet, but it's today. When will it start?
Is this site valid:http://kerbalkon.com/
that site is from the last one and has not been updated
why does it say it it right now?
because it was "now" when it was written a year ago. How is this hard to understand?
Since the two threads on this subject were, well, on the same subject, they have been merged so that all the confusing information is in one tidy place.
